FuncDef:
The if-match preference command configures a route priority-based matching rule.
The undo if-match preference command deletes a route priority-based matching rule. The if-match preference command configures a route priority-based matching rule. The undo if-match preference command deletes a route priority-based matching rule. By default, no route priority-based matching rule is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a route priority.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255.

ExtraInfo: You can use the if-match preference command to configure a node to filter routes based on the route preference. After such a filtering rule is configured, you can apply the apply clauses to change the attributes of the routes that match the filtering rule.
